tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE literature_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(50),
    publication_date DATE,
    review_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reviews_comments (
    review_id INT,
    commenter TEXT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES literature_review_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE literature_review_data (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	author TEXT,
	title TEXT,
	year INT,
	abstract TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_collaborators (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name TEXT,
	institution TEXT,
	email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE updates_log (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	update_time TIMESTAMP,
	user_id INT,
	action TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE literature_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    publish_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    institution TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE updates (
    update_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id UUID,
    researcher_id UUID,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    update_content TEXT
);
